vision.heading: Vision
vision.content: To be a leading institution in agricultural education, producing skilled professionals who contribute to sustainable agricultural development and food security.

mission.heading: Mission
points: Provide quality education in agricultural sciences aligned with ICAR standards
Promote research and innovation in sustainable agricultural practices
Develop skilled agricultural professionals with practical expertise
Foster entrepreneurship and innovation in agribusiness
Contribute to rural development and farmer welfare through extension activities
Collaborate with industry and research organizations for knowledge transfer

objectives.heading: Program Objectives
points: Provide comprehensive knowledge of agricultural sciences and allied disciplines
Develop practical skills through hands-on training and field exposure
Promote scientific temperament and research aptitude among students
Prepare students for diverse careers in agriculture and allied sectors
Inculcate values of sustainable agriculture and environmental conservation
Encourage innovation and entrepreneurship in agricultural sector
